Features.title: Features
Features.subtitle: The main features of the service, thanks to you there will be no doubt in choosing us
Features.firstItemText: Deploy any blockchain node from our catalog with minimal effort and maximum efficiency Node Setup
Features.secondItemText: All your nodes in one dashboard, designed for ease of use and reliability
Features.thirdItemText: Robust infrastructure to keep your nodes safe and ready to scale as you grow
Features.fourthItemText: Get your nodes up and running within minutes, no technical skills required
Features.fifthItemText: Stay connected with real-time updates on node performance and status

Action.title: Cost-Effective Solutions: Get premium node services without breaking the bank

Faq.title: FrequentlyÂ Asked
Faq.firtstQues: How long does it take to deploy a node?
Faq.firtstAnsw: Your order reaches us instantly, after which it is assigned an administrator who is responsible for its installation. We use the most advanced methods for installing nodes, however, the installation time of a node depends specifically on the project. The average node installation time is from 15 minutes to 1.5 hours.
